summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Just Vitality Clinic system focusing on the 5 specific fixes. All critical fixes are working correctly: Home button no longer logs out users, Admin Panel with full functionality added, PDF export restored, signature pads implemented in kiosk, and admin operations fully functional.

minor_bugs.issue: Expects query parameters instead of JSON body in POST request (405 Method Not Allowed)
minor_bugs.impact: Minor API inconsistency, but kiosk registration flow works correctly

passed_tests: ✅ Fix #1: Home button no longer logs out user - stays logged in
✅ Fix #2: Admin Panel modal accessible via Settings (gear icon)
✅ Fix #3: PDF export buttons working in Staff Portal and Analytics
✅ Fix #4: Signature pads implemented in Kiosk Step 3 for consents
✅ Fix #5: Admin Panel Users tab with add user, reset password, lock/unlock buttons
✅ Fix #6: Admin Panel Login Log tab with clear button functionality
✅ Fix #7: Admin Panel System Audit tab with patient changes log
✅ Launcher navigation works correctly (direct access when logged in)
✅ Staff Portal loads with complete patient management interface
✅ Analytics page loads with all KPIs, charts, and export functionality
✅ Kiosk registration flow complete with signature capture
✅ Authentication flow works with ADMIN/vit2025 credentials
✅ Backend API endpoints (20/21 tests passed - 95.2% success rate)
